events.message: I filed a claim after my car was hit by another vehicle at the intersection last night.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after the customer mentioned the collision involved a vehicle.
An agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case to ensure timely follow-up with the customer.
We acknowledged the receipt of the claim promptly and assured the customer we will investigate the accident details.
Requested the police report and photos of the vehicle damage from the customer to support the investigation.
Customer submitted all required documents including photos and the official accident report as requested.
Investigation into the details of the vehicle collision began after reviewing all submitted evidence.
The investigation found the fault lies with the other driver who ran a red light causing the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the total vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses.
Customer responded positively, thanking for the quick resolution and clear communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved to move forward with payment based on the agreed settlement amount.
The payment covering all repair costs and related expenses was issued successfully to the customerâ€™s account.
The claim for the auto accident has been officially closed following the successful completion of payment.
